articles.author: Mike Florio
articles.title: Matthew Stafford to Giants, Aaron Rodgers to Rams? - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Scouting Combine in Indianapolis will become not only Tampering Central but also the thickest patch in the NFL grapevine of the offseason.
articles.content: The Scouting Combine in Indianapolis will become not only Tampering Central but also the thickest patch in the NFL grapevine of the offseason. Rumors will be rampant. Some will be accurate, some wont… [+1483 chars]
